name: Proto Moose
description:
"This game really made me feel like I was a moose." - IGN

Proto Moose is a game made for the "I cant make a game but i can certainly make a rip-off" jam where the goal is to ripoff a pre-existing game. Proto Moose is a ripoff of Megaman, Silver Surfer, and Super Mario Bros.

This game is playable for both WINDOWS and MAC.

THE STORY:

In the year 30XX 

Humans and Moose live in harmony and stuff.

 But then... 

The evil Dr. Nepravil hates Moose, so he captures and verbally abuses them! 

So the good Dr. Nitsta sent out his prototype cyborg moose to capture Nepravil, and save the world.

Special Thanks:

Hayden for the glorious box art

NeatNeet for the awesome soundtrack
